00025         {

00028             {
00029                 //fill the datagrid with wannabe users

00031                 NewUserDataGrid.DataSource = data.GetEnabledPMTUsers(false);
00032                 NewUserDataGrid.DataBind();
00033             }
00034         }

00050         private void InitializeComponent()
00051         {
00052             NewUserDataGrid.ItemDataBound += new DataGridItemEventHandler(NewUserDataGrid_ItemDataBound);
00053             this.NewUserDataGrid.DeleteCommand += new System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventHandler(this.NewUserDataGrid_DeleteCommand);
00054             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00055 
00056         }
00057         #endregion
00058 
00059         private void NewUserDataGrid_DeleteCommand(object source, DataGridCommandEventArgs e)
00060         {
00061             string delID = (NewUserDataGrid.Items[e.Item.ItemIndex].Cells[0].Text);
00062             IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00063             conn.DeletePMTUser(Convert.ToInt32(delID), null);
00064             NewUserDataGrid.DataBind();
00065         }
00066 
00067         private void NewUserDataGrid_ItemDataBound(object sender, DataGridItemEventArgs e)
00068         {
00069             if (e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.Item || e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.AlternatingItem)
00070             {
00071                 e.Item.Cells[5].Text = Enum.GetName(typeof(PMTUserRole), Convert.ToInt32(e.Item.Cells[5].Text));
00072             }
00073         }
00074     }
